word_mean: 鸡奸，男色，兽奸：一种性欲倒错，法律上有几种不同解释，包括人与其他种属动物之间的性接触，人与人之间的口-生殖器或肛门接触
医学上限指人兽性交和肛门性交

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from medieval Latin sodomia, from late Latin peccatum Sodomiticum 'sin of Sodom' (after Gen. 19:5, which implies that the men of Sodom practised homosexual rape) (see Sodom)

means.word_mean: 1. anal intercourse committed by a man with a man or woman
